data.title: Companion Funeral & Cremation Service
data.meta_description: Marvin Jason Centers, 42, of Cleveland, passed away in a local hospital on December 9, 2019. He was a loving husband, son, and friend to all. He loved working on cars and trucks...
data.text:
Marvin Jason Centers, 42, of Cleveland, passed away in a local hospital on December 9, 2019. He was a loving husband, son, and friend to all. He loved working on cars and trucks and especially riding his Harley and fishing and woodwork. He was a loving dog dad to his two furbabies, Fat boy and Petey.

He leaves behind to cherish his memories to his loving wife of 13 years Melinda Centers, father Marvin Centers (Wanda), grandmother Frances Centers, Mother in law, Velma Hicks, father in law, James Moser (Karen), 3 sisters, Lisa Centers, Connie Hendrix (John), Donna Ellis (Dennis) 1 brother Bobbie Perrry (Sharm) sister in law, Nicole Barrineau (Chris) and several nieces and nephews and friends who adored him. He was preceded in death by his mother Rachel Buckner and grandfather Marvin "Dock" Centers.

The family will receive friends on Saturday, December 14, 2019 in the chapel of Companion Funeral Home located at 2415 Georgetown Road in Cleveland from 5-7PM. A Celebration of Life Memorial Service will follow at 7:00PM.

Companion Funeral Home and the Cody family are honored to assist the Centers family with these arrangements.
